original_text: And the priest shall take some of its blood with his finger and put it on the horns of the altar of burnt offering and pour out all the rest of its blood at the base of the altar.
korean_text: 제사장은 손가락으로 그 피를 찍어 번제단 뿔들에 바르고 그 피 전부를 제단 밑에 쏟고

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall take some of its blood with his finger
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그 피의 일부를 손가락으로 찍어

sentences.original_text: and put it on the horns of the altar of burnt offering
and pour out all the rest of its blood at the base of the altar.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 나머지 피는 전부 제단 밑에 쏟아야 할지니라
